title: Moderators: Yes, Users Still Hate Proton
content:
This thread will probably be locked, but I'm going to post it anyway, so that it can be seen by other users who agree. To summarize:

1. @cor_el, you've been particularly helpful in the past, and I value your input whether or not I agree with your responses, and whether you post those responses as a user or in your official capacity as moderator. 2. Proton sucks. The lack of visual contrast and the inability to reposition pop-up windows suck in particular. 3. User feedback matters. 4. I will not register for a third-party app simply to give direct feedback to Mozilla. Companies need to increase their capacity to engage with customers directly. Without customers, a company spits into the wind. 5. While I am proficient at a number of technology skills, I do not have the capacity to master CSS.

Thank you. ajk1962f
creator: ajk1962f

title: Firefox won't let me download anything?
content: Every time I try and download anything on the download queue it puts a yellow error symbol above the download. I've cleared all my browsing data and cache and it still will not work. Really need help. P.S. On Manjaro Linux
creator: encrypted401
